description:
A training tee that looks just as good in town. Thin, quick-drying fabric keeps you comfortable while you work hard, and a fun strappy back adds some flair when you're out and about.Lightweight recycled polyester wicks away moisture.Dropped hem and crossback straps balance coverage and ventilation.

        Sustainability














                      Recycled content
name: Craft Core Charge Cross Back T-Shirt - Women's
